meta.title: SQL to JSON Converter - ilmainen online-tietokantatyökalu
meta.description: [Pending Translation] Transform SQL INSERT statements into JSON arrays instantly with our free online tool. Fast, accurate, and secure.
meta.subtitle: [Pending Translation] Easily convert between SQL data and JSON objects

editor.ph_input_json: [Pending Translation] Paste your JSON array here...
editor.ph_output_sql: [Pending Translation] Generated SQL will appear here...

content.hero_subtitle: [Pending Translation] Bidirectional conversion for modern developers
content.p1: [Pending Translation] Modern applications thrive on JSON, but databases still speak SQL. Our bidirectional converter bridges this gap effortlessly. Whether you need to turn database exports into JSON for your API, or JSON data into SQL seeding scripts, this tool provides a fast, secure, and accurate solution.
content.integration_desc: [Pending Translation] Easily move data between your relational database and your web application. Our parser handles standard SQL INSERT statements and converts them into structured JSON objects, preserving data types and values.

instant.title: [Pending Translation] Instant Results
instant.desc: [Pending Translation] Conversions happen in real-time as you click.

bidirectional.title: [Pending Translation] Dual Mode
bidirectional.desc: [Pending Translation] Switch between SQL-to-JSON and JSON-to-SQL modes.

security.title: [Pending Translation] Secure Conversion
security.desc: [Pending Translation] Processing is 100% client-side for maximum privacy.

custom.title: [Pending Translation] Clean Formatting
custom.desc: [Pending Translation] Output is professionally formatted and ready to use.

types.title: [Pending Translation] Type Awareness
types.desc: [Pending Translation] Correctly handles nulls, numbers, and strings.

free.title: [Pending Translation] Totally Free
free.desc: [Pending Translation] No subscription or usage limits.

seeding.title: [Pending Translation] Database Seeding
seeding.desc: [Pending Translation] Quickly generate SQL scripts to populate your dev environment.

export.title: [Pending Translation] Data Exporting
export.desc: [Pending Translation] Convert SQL query results into JSON for analysis.

migration.title: [Pending Translation] API Migration
migration.desc: [Pending Translation] Prepare legacy database data for use in modern REST APIs.

testing.title: [Pending Translation] Mock Data
testing.desc: [Pending Translation] Create JSON mock data from existing SQL tables.

docs.title: [Pending Translation] Documentation
docs.desc: [Pending Translation] Include JSON examples of your database structure in docs.

prototype.title: [Pending Translation] Rapid Prototyping
prototype.desc: [Pending Translation] Move data quickly between states during development.

1.title: [Pending Translation] Select Mode
1.desc: [Pending Translation] Choose between JSON to SQL or SQL to JSON using the buttons.

2.title: [Pending Translation] Input Data
2.desc: [Pending Translation] Paste your source code into the left editor area.

3.title: [Pending Translation] Set Table Name
3.desc: [Pending Translation] If converting to SQL, specify the target database table.

4.title: [Pending Translation] Generate
4.desc: [Pending Translation] Click 'Generate' to see the transformation instantly.

5.title: [Pending Translation] Copy Result
5.desc: [Pending Translation] Use the 'Copy' button to grab your output.

samples.title: [Pending Translation] SQL Insert to JSON
samples.desc: [Pending Translation] INSERT INTO users (name, age) VALUES ('Alice', 25); → [{"name": "Alice", "age": 25}]

faq.q1: [Pending Translation] What SQL statements are supported?
faq.a1: [Pending Translation] Currently, the tool supports standard INSERT INTO statements with defined column names.
faq.a2: [Pending Translation] Yes, we never send your data to our server. All logic runs in your browser.
faq.q3: [Pending Translation] Can I convert multiple rows?
faq.a3: [Pending Translation] Yes, the tool handles multi-line SQL or large JSON arrays efficiently.
faq.q4: [Pending Translation] Does it handle special characters?
faq.a4: [Pending Translation] Yes, it correctly escapes single quotes and handles basic special characters.
